inputsClass.name: layout
inputsClass.rawdescription:
Defining the layout of the loading component. By default the
component loading activity is used.
inputsClass.description: Defining the layout of the loading component. By default the component loading activity is used.

inputsClass.name: message
inputsClass.rawdescription: Showing a message while loading. The application layout by default shows the label `Loading…`.
inputsClass.description: Showing a message while loading. The application layout by default shows the label Loading….

inputsClass.name: progress
inputsClass.rawdescription: If set, a progress bar is shown. The layout property is ignored.
inputsClass.description: If set, a progress bar is shown. The layout property is ignored.
